artifacts.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: MemoryOS Common API Components
  version: 1.0.0
  description: Shared components for all MemoryOS API planes

components:
  # Security Schemes
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: JWT token for app plane authentication

    mTLS:
      type: mutualTLS
      description: mTLS certificate for agents plane authentication

    AdminAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: Admin JWT with elevated privileges for control plane

  # Common Error Responses
  responses:
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "VALIDATION_ERROR"
              message: "Request validation failed"
              details:
                - field: "space_id"
                  issue: "Field required"

    Unauthorized:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "UNAUTHORIZED"
              message: "Authentication required"

    Forbidden:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "INSUFFICIENT_PRIVILEGES"
              message: "Operation requires elevated privileges"

    NotFound:
      description: Resource not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
              message: "The requested resource was not found"

    RateLimited:
      description: Rate limit exceeded
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED"
              message: "Too many requests"
              retry_after: 60

    InternalError:
      description: Internal server error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
          example:
            error:
              code: "INTERNAL_ERROR"
              message: "An unexpected error occurred"

  # Common Schemas
  schemas:
    # Error Response
    ErrorResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - error
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorDetail'

    ErrorDetail:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: Machine-readable error code
          examples: ["VALIDATION_ERROR", "UNAUTHORIZED", "RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED"]
        message:
          type: string
          description: Human-readable error message
        details:
          type: array
          description: Additional error details
          items:
            type: object
        retry_after:
          type: integer
          description: Seconds to wait before retrying (for rate limits)

    # Pagination
    PaginationRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        limit:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
          maximum: 1000
          default: 50
          description: Maximum number of items to return
        offset:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          default: 0
          description: Number of items to skip
        cursor:
          type: string
          description: Cursor for cursor-based pagination

    PaginationResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - total
        - limit
        - offset
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of items available
        limit:
          type: integer
          description: Maximum number of items in this response
        offset:
          type: integer
          description: Number of items skipped
        next_cursor:
          type: string
          description: Cursor for next page (if available)
        has_more:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether more items are available

    # Common Headers
    CommonHeaders:
      type: object
      properties:
        QoS-Priority:
          type: string
          enum: ["low", "normal", "high", "critical"]
          description: Quality of Service priority level
        X-Request-ID:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique request identifier for tracing
        X-Space-ID:
          type: string
          format: ulid
          description: Memory space identifier for multi-tenancy

    # Common Response Metadata
    ResponseMetadata:
      type: object
      properties:
        request_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique request identifier
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Response timestamp (ISO 8601)
        processing_time_ms:
          type: integer
          description: Server processing time in milliseconds

  # Common Parameters
  parameters:
    SpaceId:
      name: space_id
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        format: ulid
      description: Memory space identifier

    RequestId:
      name: X-Request-ID
      in: header
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        format: uuid
      description: Unique request identifier for tracing

    QoSPriority:
      name: QoS-Priority
      in: header
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum: ["low", "normal", "high", "critical"]
        default: "normal"
      description: Quality of Service priority level

    Limit:
      name: limit
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 1
        maximum: 1000
        default: 50
      description: Maximum number of items to return

    Offset:
      name: offset
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 0
        default: 0
      description: Number of items to skip

    Cursor:
      name: cursor
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: Cursor for pagination

openapi: 3.1.0
jsonSchemaDialect: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
info:
  title: FamilyOS API (Agents · App · Control)
  version: 1.1.0
  description: >
    Contract-first API for FamilyOS across Agents/App/Control planes.
    Matches the expanded architecture diagram: endpoints route via legacy routers
    (api_routes, api_events, api_priv, api_keys, api_rbac, api_registry, api_sync),
    then into services (svc_write, svc_recall, svc_index) and pipelines (P01–P20).
    SLO hints: write p95≤80ms, recall p95≤120ms, encrypt p95≤15ms, index p95≤250ms, sync window≤5s.
  license: 
    name: Proprietary
    url: https://familyos.local/license
  x-contract:
    envelopeSchemaRef: ./events/envelope.schema.json
    policyVersioningDoc: ../POLICY_VERSIONING.md
  x-slo:
    write_p95_ms: 80
    recall_p95_ms: 120
    encrypt_p95_ms: 15
    index_rebuild_p95_ms: 250
    sync_window_s: 5
  x-diagram:
    graphId: familyos_big_v1
    format: mermaid
    nodes:
      # Routers (expanded style)
      api_routes: {kind: router, title: "api/routes.py"}
      api_events: {kind: router, title: "api/events.py"}
      api_priv: {kind: router, title: "api/privacy.py"}
      api_keys: {kind: router, title: "api/keys.py"}
      api_rbac: {kind: router, title: "api/rbac.py"}
      api_registry: {kind: router, title: "api/registry.py"}
      api_sync: {kind: router, title: "api/sync.py"}
      CTRL: {kind: plane, title: "Control Plane router"}

      # Services
      svc_write: {kind: service, title: "services/write_service.py"}
      svc_recall: {kind: service, title: "services/retrieval_service.py"}
      svc_index: {kind: service, title: "services/indexing_service.py"}

      # Pipelines/Buses
      P01: {kind: pipeline, title: "Recall/Read"}
      P02: {kind: pipeline, title: "Write/Ingest"}
      P11: {kind: pipeline, title: "DSAR/GDPR"}
      P12: {kind: pipeline, title: "Device/E2EE"}
      P13: {kind: pipeline, title: "Index Rebuild"}
      P16: {kind: pipeline, title: "Feature Flags/A-B"}
      P17: {kind: pipeline, title: "QoS/Cost"}
      P18: {kind: pipeline, title: "Safety/Abuse"}
      evt_bus: {kind: bus, title: "events/bus.py"}

servers:
- url: https://agents.familyos.local
  description: Agents Plane (mTLS)
- url: https://app.familyos.local
  description: App Plane (Bearer)
- url: https://control.familyos.local
  description: Control Plane (mTLS + RBAC)

security:
- mtls: []
- bearer: []

tags:
- name: Plane:Agents
  description: Agent-facing API surface
- name: Plane:App
  description: Human app endpoints  
- name: Plane:Control
  description: Admin/ops control plane
- name: Pipeline:P01 Recall
  description: Memory recall and retrieval operations
- name: Pipeline:P02 Write
  description: Memory write and ingestion operations
- name: Pipeline:P11 DSAR
  description: Data subject access request processing
- name: Pipeline:P12 Device/E2EE
  description: Device management and encryption
- name: Pipeline:P13 Index Rebuild
  description: Search index reconstruction
- name: Pipeline:P16 Feature Flags
  description: Feature flag and A/B testing
- name: Pipeline:P17 QoS/Cost Governance
  description: Quality of service and cost controls
- name: Pipeline:P18 Safety/Abuse
  description: Safety monitoring and abuse prevention
- name: Observability
  description: Metrics, health, and monitoring endpoints
- name: Security
  description: Authentication, authorization, and security
- name: Privacy
  description: Privacy controls and data protection
- name: Registry
- name: RBAC
- name: Sync
- name: Events
- name: Sharing

paths:

  ########################################
  # P02 Write — Submit content → durable #
  ########################################
  /v1/tools/memory/submit:
    post:
      operationId: submitMemory
      summary: Submit a memory item to the write pipeline (P02)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Pipeline:P02 Write]
      security: [mtls: [], bearer: []]
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XTraceId'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XPolicyVersion'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XQoSLatencyBudget'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitRequest'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Envelope'
      responses:
        '202': {description: Accepted, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitAccepted'}}}}
        '4XX': {$ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'}
        '5XX': {$ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError'}
      x-slo: {p95_ms: 80}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_submit
        connects:
        - {from: ep_submit, to: api_routes}
        - {from: api_routes, to: svc_write}
        - {from: svc_write, to: P02}

  ######################################
  # P01 Recall — Retrieval via Broker  #
  ######################################
  /v1/tools/memory/recall:
    post:
      operationId: recallMemory
      summary: Recall items via retrieval broker (P01)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Pipeline:P01 Recall]
      security: [mtls: [], bearer: []]
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XTraceId'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XQoSLatencyBudget'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RecallRequest'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RecallResponse'}}}}
        '4XX': {$ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'}
        '5XX': {$ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError'}
      x-slo: {p95_ms: 120}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_recall
        connects:
        - {from: ep_recall, to: api_routes}
        - {from: api_routes, to: svc_recall}
        - {from: svc_recall, to: P01}

  ############################
  # Receipts & idempotency   #
  ############################
  /v1/receipts/{envelope_id}:
    get:
      operationId: getReceipt
      summary: Fetch a write receipt / UoW audit record
      tags: [Plane:App, Observability]
      security: [bearer: [], mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: envelope_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/WriteReceipt'}}}}
        '404': {$ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'}

  #########################################
  # Events Stream (SSE) — Validated bus   #
  #########################################
  /v1/events/stream:
    get:
      operationId: eventsStream
      summary: Server-Sent Events of validated envelopes
      tags: [Plane:App, Events]
      security: [bearer: [], mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: query
        name: topics
        schema: {type: array, items: {type: string}}
        style: form
        explode: true
      - in: query
        name: spaces
        schema: {type: array, items: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}}
        style: form
        explode: true
      - in: header
        name: Last-Event-ID
        schema: {type: string}
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XTraceId'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: text/event-stream
          content:
            text/event-stream:
              schema: {type: string}
        '401': {$ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_events_stream
        connects:
        - {from: ep_events_stream, to: api_events}
        - {from: api_events, to: evt_bus}

  ###########################
  # Sharing semantics (P02) #
  ###########################
  /v1/tools/memory/project:
    post:
      operationId: projectMemory
      summary: Create a policy-gated project/share link (link_group_id)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Sharing, Pipeline:P02 Write]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectRequest'}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Accepted, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectAccepted'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_project
        connects:
        - {from: ep_project, to: api_routes}
        - {from: api_routes, to: svc_write}
        - {from: svc_write, to: P02}

  /v1/tools/memory/refer:
    post:
      operationId: referMemory
      summary: Policy-gated reference to existing memory (read-through)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Sharing, Pipeline:P01 Recall]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/ReferRequest'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/ReferResponse'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_refer
        connects:
        - {from: ep_refer, to: api_routes}
        - {from: api_routes, to: svc_recall}
        - {from: svc_recall, to: P01}

  /v1/tools/memory/detach:
    post:
      operationId: detachCopy
      summary: Admin promote — create a detached copy (policy-gated)
      tags: [Plane:Control, Sharing, Pipeline:P02 Write]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/DetachRequest'}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Accepted, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectAccepted'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_detach
        connects:
        - {from: ep_detach, to: CTRL}
        - {from: CTRL, to: svc_write}
        - {from: svc_write, to: P02}

  /v1/tools/memory/undo:
    post:
      operationId: undoShare
      summary: AMBER undo within window (policy dependent)
      tags: [Plane:App, Sharing, Privacy]
      security: [bearer: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/UndoShareRequest'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'

  ############################################
  # Privacy — DSAR (P11) create/status/cancel
  ############################################
  /v1/privacy/dsar/requests:
    post:
      operationId: createDsar
      summary: Create a DSAR request (export or erasure)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Plane:App, Pipeline:P11 DSAR, Privacy]
      security: [mtls: [], bearer: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/DsarRequest'}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Accepted, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/JobAccepted'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_dsar_create
        connects:
        - {from: ep_dsar_create, to: api_priv}
        - {from: api_priv, to: P11}

  /v1/privacy/dsar/requests/{job_id}:
    get:
      operationId: getDsarStatus
      summary: Get DSAR job status/result
      tags: [Plane:App, Pipeline:P11 DSAR, Privacy]
      security: [bearer: [], mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: job_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/JobStatus'}}}}
        '404': {$ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_dsar_status
        connects:
        - {from: ep_dsar_status, to: api_priv}
        - {from: api_priv, to: P11}

  /v1/privacy/dsar/requests/{job_id}/cancel:
    post:
      operationId: cancelDsar
      summary: Cancel a DSAR job (best-effort)
      tags: [Plane:App, Pipeline:P11 DSAR, Privacy]
      security: [bearer: [], mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: job_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Cancel accepted}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_dsar_cancel
        connects:
        - {from: ep_dsar_cancel, to: api_priv}
        - {from: api_priv, to: P11}

  ##############################################
  # Security — MLS/E2EE (P12) and Key Ops     #
  ##############################################
  /v1/security/mls/groups/{group_id}/join:
    post:
      operationId: joinMlsGroup
      summary: Join or create an MLS group (E2EE)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Pipeline:P12 Device/E2EE, Security]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: group_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string, minLength: 3, maxLength: 64}
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/MlsJoinRequest'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/MlsJoinResponse'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_mls_join
        connects:
        - {from: ep_mls_join, to: api_keys}
        - {from: api_keys, to: P12}

  /v1/security/keys/rotate:
    post:
      operationId: rotateKeys
      summary: Rotate signing/encryption key material
      tags: [Plane:Control, Security, Pipeline:P12 Device/E2EE]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/KeyRotateRequest'}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Rotation initiated}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_rotate_keys
        connects:
        - {from: ep_rotate_keys, to: api_keys}
        - {from: api_keys, to: P12}

  /v1/security/ratchet/advance:
    post:
      operationId: ratchetAdvance
      summary: Advance double-ratchet state for a group/device
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Security, Pipeline:P12 Device/E2EE]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RatchetAdvanceRequest'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_ratchet_advance
        connects:
        - {from: ep_ratchet_advance, to: api_keys}
        - {from: api_keys, to: P12}

  ##############################################
  # Index Rebuild (P13) — start/status/cancel  #
  ##############################################
  /v1/admin/index/rebuild:
    post:
      operationId: startIndexRebuild
      summary: Start an index rebuild job (P13)
      tags: [Plane:Control, Pipeline:P13 Index Rebuild]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexRebuildRequest'}
      responses:
        '202': {description: job created, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/JobAccepted'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_idx_rebuild
        connects:
        - {from: ep_idx_rebuild, to: CTRL}
        - {from: CTRL, to: svc_index}
        - {from: svc_index, to: P13}

  /v1/admin/index/rebuild/{job_id}:
    get:
      operationId: getIndexRebuildStatus
      summary: Get index rebuild job status/result
      tags: [Plane:Control, Pipeline:P13 Index Rebuild]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: job_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/JobStatus'}}}}
        '404': {$ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_idx_status
        connects:
        - {from: ep_idx_status, to: CTRL}
        - {from: CTRL, to: svc_index}

  /v1/admin/index/rebuild/{job_id}/cancel:
    post:
      operationId: cancelIndexRebuild
      summary: Cancel an index rebuild job
      tags: [Plane:Control, Pipeline:P13 Index Rebuild]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: job_id
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '202': {description: Cancel accepted}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_idx_cancel
        connects:
        - {from: ep_idx_cancel, to: CTRL}
        - {from: CTRL, to: svc_index}

  /v1/registry/prompts:

  ###################
  # RBAC management #
  ###################

  # Issue #26.1: Role hierarchy and inheritance
  /v1/rbac/roles:
    get:
      operationId: listRoles
      summary: List roles with hierarchy information
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: include_hierarchy
        in: query
        schema: {type: boolean, default: false}
        description: Include role inheritance hierarchy
      - name: expand_capabilities
        in: query
        schema: {type: boolean, default: false}
        description: Expand inherited capabilities
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RolesList'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_roles_list
        connects:
        - {from: ep_roles_list, to: api_rbac}
    post:
      operationId: createRole
      summary: Create a new role with hierarchy support
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleDefinition'}
      responses:
        '201': {description: Created}
        '400': {description: Invalid role definition}
        '409': {description: Role already exists}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_role_create
        connects:
        - {from: ep_role_create, to: api_rbac}

  /v1/rbac/roles/{roleName}:
    get:
      operationId: getRole
      summary: Get role details with inheritance
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: roleName
        in: path
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - name: expand_capabilities
        in: query
        schema: {type: boolean, default: true}
        description: Include inherited capabilities
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleDetail'}}}}
        '404': {description: Role not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_role_detail
        connects:
        - {from: ep_role_detail, to: api_rbac}
    put:
      operationId: updateRole
      summary: Update role definition
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: roleName
        in: path
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleDefinition'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: Updated}
        '404': {description: Role not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_role_update
        connects:
        - {from: ep_role_update, to: api_rbac}
    delete:
      operationId: deleteRole
      summary: Delete role and cascade to bindings
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: roleName
        in: path
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: Deleted}
        '404': {description: Role not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_role_delete
        connects:
        - {from: ep_role_delete, to: api_rbac}

  # Issue #26.2: Dynamic role assignment
  /v1/rbac/bindings:
    get:
      operationId: listBindings
      summary: List role bindings with filtering
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: subject_id
        in: query
        schema: {type: string}
        description: Filter by subject ID
      - name: role
        in: query
        schema: {type: string}
        description: Filter by role name
      - name: space_id
        in: query
        schema: {type: string}
        description: Filter by space ID
      - name: include_expired
        in: query
        schema: {type: boolean, default: false}
        description: Include expired bindings
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/BindingsList'}}}}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_bindings_list
        connects:
        - {from: ep_bindings_list, to: api_rbac}
    post:
      operationId: createBinding
      summary: Create/update a role binding with dynamic assignment
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleBinding'}
      responses:
        '201': {description: Created}
        '202': {description: Pending approval}
        '400': {description: Invalid binding}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_binding_create
        connects:
        - {from: ep_binding_create, to: api_rbac}

  /v1/rbac/bindings/{bindingId}:
    get:
      operationId: getBinding
      summary: Get binding details
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: bindingId
        in: path
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/BindingDetail'}}}}
        '404': {description: Binding not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_binding_detail
        connects:
        - {from: ep_binding_detail, to: api_rbac}
    delete:
      operationId: deleteBinding
      summary: Remove role binding
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      parameters:
      - name: bindingId
        in: path
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200': {description: Deleted}
        '404': {description: Binding not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_binding_delete
        connects:
        - {from: ep_binding_delete, to: api_rbac}

  # Dynamic assignment workflows
  /v1/rbac/assignments/request:
    post:
      operationId: requestRoleAssignment
      summary: Request role assignment with approval workflow
      tags: [Plane:Control, RBAC]
      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/AssignmentRequest'}
      responses:
        '201': {description: Request created}
        '202': {description: Pending approval}
        '400': {description: Invalid request}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_assignment_request
        connects:
        - {from: ep_assignment_request, to: api_rbac}

  /v1/rbac/assignments/approve:
    post:
      operationId: approveAssignment

      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/AssignmentApproval'}
      responses:
        '200': {description: Approved}
        '404': {description: Request not found}
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_assignment_approve
        connects:
        - {from: ep_assignment_approve, to: api_rbac}

  # Issue #26.3: Role-based endpoint access control
  /v1/rbac/evaluate:
    post:
      operationId: evaluateAccess

      security: [mtls: []]
      requestBody:

        '200': {description: OK, content: {application/json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/AccessDecision'}}}}
        '400':

        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '429':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequests'
      x-diagram:
        nodeId: ep_access_evaluate
        connects:
        - {from: ep_access_evaluate, to: api_rbac}

  /v1/metrics:

              schema: {type: string}
        '401': {$ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'}

components:

  securitySchemes:
    mtls:
      type: mutualTLS
      description: mTLS for Agents & Control
    bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: App Plane tokens

  parameters:
    XTraceId:
      in: header
      name: X-Trace-Id
      schema: {type: string, pattern: "^[a-f0-9]{32}$"}
    XPolicyVersion:
      in: header
      name: X-Policy-Version
      schema: {type: string, pattern: "^(0|[1-9]\\d*)\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*)(?:\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))?$"}
    XQoSLatencyBudget:
      in: header
      name: X-QoS-Latency-Budget
      schema: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 1000}

  responses:
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad request
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    Unauthorized:
      description: Unauthorized
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    Forbidden:
      description: Forbidden
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    NotFound:
      description: Not found
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    Conflict:
      description: Conflict
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    TooManyRequests:
      description: Rate limited
      headers:
        Retry-After:
          schema: {type: integer, minimum: 1}
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}
    ServerError:
      description: Server error
      content: {application/problem+json: {schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}}}

  schemas:

    Envelope:
      description: Canonical Event Envelope (validated at bus ingress)
      externalDocs: {description: contracts/events/envelope.schema.json, url: ../../events/envelope.schema.json}
      allOf: [$ref: '../../events/envelope.schema.json']

    Problem:
      type: object
      required: [type, title, status]
      properties:
        type: {type: string, format: uri}
        title: {type: string}
        status: {type: integer, minimum: 100, maximum: 599}
        detail: {type: string}
        instance: {type: string, format: uri}
        traceId: {type: string, pattern: "^[a-f0-9]{32}$"}

    SubmitRequest:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required: [space_id]
      properties:
        space_id: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}
        text: {type: string}
        attachments: {type: array, items: {type: string, format: uri}}
        payload: {type: object}
        idempotency_key: {type: string, pattern: "^[A-Za-z0-9._:-]{8,64}$"}
        qos:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            priority: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 10}
            latency_budget_ms: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 1000}
            retries: {type: integer, minimum: 0, maximum: 3}

    SubmitAccepted:
      type: object
      required: [status, envelope_id]
      properties:
        status: {type: string, enum: [accepted]}
        envelope_id: {type: string}
        receipt_url: {type: string, format: uri}

    WriteReceipt:
      type: object
      required: [envelope_id, committed, stores]
      properties:
        envelope_id: {type: string}
        committed: {type: boolean}
        stores:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              name: {type: string}
              ts: {type: string, format: date-time}

    RecallRequest:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required: [query]
      properties:
        query: {type: string, minLength: 1}
        space_id: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}
        k: {type: integer, default: 10, minimum: 1, maximum: 200}
        filters:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            after: {type: string, format: date-time}
            before: {type: string, format: date-time}
            topics: {type: array, items: {type: string}}
            bands: {type: array, items: {type: string, enum: [GREEN, AMBER, RED, BLACK]}}
        return_trace: {type: boolean, default: false}
        qos:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            latency_budget_ms: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 1000}
            priority: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 10}

    RecallResponse:
      type: object
      required: [items]
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required: [id, score]
            properties:
              id: {type: string}
              score: {type: number, minimum: 0}
              topic: {type: string}
              band: {type: string, enum: [GREEN, AMBER, RED, BLACK]}
              snippet: {type: string}
              space_id: {type: string}
              payload: {type: object}
        trace:
          type: object
          properties:
            features: {type: array, items: {type: string}}
            fusion: {type: object, additionalProperties: true}
            ranker: {type: object, additionalProperties: true}

    # Sharing schemas
    ProjectRequest:
      type: object
      required: [source_id, target_space_id]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        source_id: {type: string}
        target_space_id: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}
        mode: {type: string, enum: [project, copy]}
        comment: {type: string, maxLength: 512}

    ProjectAccepted:
      type: object
      required: [link_group_id, status]
      properties:
        link_group_id: {type: string}
        status: {type: string, enum: [accepted]}

    ReferRequest:
      type: object
      required: [source_id]
      properties:
        source_id: {type: string}
        filters:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            bands: {type: array, items: {type: string, enum: [GREEN, AMBER, RED, BLACK]}}

    ReferResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        resolved: {type: boolean}
        payload: {type: object}

    DetachRequest:
      type: object
      required: [source_id]
      properties:
        source_id: {type: string}
        target_space_id: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}

    UndoShareRequest:
      type: object
      required: [link_group_id]
      properties:
        link_group_id: {type: string}

    # Privacy / DSAR
    DsarRequest:
      type: object
      required: [type, subject]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        type: {type: string, enum: [export, erasure]}
        subject:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            user_id: {type: string, format: uuid}
            space_id: {type: string, pattern: "^(personal|selective|shared|extended|interfamily):"}
        filters:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          properties:
            after: {type: string, format: date-time}
            before: {type: string, format: date-time}

    JobAccepted:
      type: object
      required: [job_id, status]
      properties:
        job_id: {type: string}
        status: {type: string, enum: [pending, running]}
        status_url: {type: string, format: uri}

    JobStatus:
      type: object
      required: [job_id, status]
      properties:
        job_id: {type: string}
        status: {type: string, enum: [pending, running, complete, failed]}
        result_url: {type: string, format: uri}
        error: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'}

    # Security
    MlsJoinRequest:
      type: object
      required: [device_id, public_key]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        device_id: {type: string, minLength: 3, maxLength: 64}
        public_key: {type: string, contentEncoding: base64}

    MlsJoinResponse:
      type: object
      required: [group_id, device_id, epoch]
      properties:
        group_id: {type: string}
        device_id: {type: string}
        epoch: {type: integer, minimum: 0}
        welcome: {type: string, contentEncoding: base64}

    KeyRotateRequest:
      type: object
      required: [scope]
      properties:
        scope: {type: string, enum: [signing, encryption, all]}

    RatchetAdvanceRequest:
      type: object
      required: [group_id, device_id]
      properties:
        group_id: {type: string}
        device_id: {type: string}

    # Index Rebuild
    IndexRebuildRequest:
      type: object
      required: [scope]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        scope: {type: string, enum: [fts, vector, embeddings, semantic, all]}
        shard_ids: {type: array, items: {type: string}}
        resume_from_checkpoint: {type: boolean, default: true}

    # Registry
    ToolsList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required: [id, name]
            properties:
              id: {type: string}
              name: {type: string}
              caps: {type: array, items: {type: string}}

    PromptsList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required: [id, name]
            properties:
              id: {type: string}
              name: {type: string}
              content: {type: string}

    # RBAC - Enhanced for Issue #26
    RolesList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleDetail'

    RoleDetail:
      type: object
      required: [name, capabilities]
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          pattern: "^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*$"
          maxLength: 64
        description: {type: string}
        capabilities:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            pattern: "^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*:[a-z0-9_*]+$"
        inherits:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
          description: "Roles this role inherits from"
        inherited_capabilities:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
          description: "Capabilities inherited from parent roles"
        created_at: {type: string, format: date-time}
        updated_at: {type: string, format: date-time}

    RoleDefinition:
      type: object
      required: [name, capabilities]
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          pattern: "^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*$"
          maxLength: 64
        description: {type: string}
        capabilities:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            pattern: "^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*:[a-z0-9_*]+$"
        inherits:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
          description: "Roles to inherit from"

    BindingsList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BindingDetail'

    BindingDetail:
      type: object
      required: [id, role, subject, scope, status]
      properties:
        id: {type: string}
        role: {type: string}
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Subject'
        scope:
          type: object
          properties:
            type: {type: string, enum: [global, space, resource]}
            space_id: {type: string}
            resource_id: {type: string}
        status: {type: string, enum: [active, pending, expired, revoked]}
        expires_at: {type: string, format: date-time}
        created_at: {type: string, format: date-time}
        created_by: {type: string}
        approved_by: {type: string}
        approval_reason: {type: string}

    RoleBinding:
      type: object
      required: [role, subject, scope]
      properties:
        role: {type: string}
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Subject'
        scope:
          type: object
          required: [type]
          properties:
            type: {type: string, enum: [global, space, resource]}
            space_id: {type: string}
            resource_id: {type: string}
        expires_at: {type: string, format: date-time}
        justification: {type: string}
        approval_required: {type: boolean, default: false}

    Subject:
      type: object
      required: [type, id]
      properties:
        type: {type: string, enum: [user, device, agent, service]}
        id: {type: string}
        display_name: {type: string}

    AssignmentRequest:
      type: object
      required: [role, subject, scope, justification]
      properties:
        role: {type: string}
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Subject'
        scope:
          type: object
          required: [type]
          properties:
            type: {type: string, enum: [global, space, resource]}
            space_id: {type: string}
            resource_id: {type: string}
        justification:
          type: string
          minLength: 10
          maxLength: 500
        duration:
          type: string
          pattern: "^\\d+[hmds]$"
          description: "Duration like '2h', '30m', '1d'"
        urgent: {type: boolean, default: false}

    AssignmentApproval:
      type: object
      required: [request_id, decision]
      properties:
        request_id: {type: string}
        decision: {type: string, enum: [approve, deny]}
        reason: {type: string}
        modified_duration:
          type: string
          pattern: "^\\d+[hmds]$"
          description: "Override duration if approving"

    AccessEvaluationRequest:
      type: object
      required: [subject, endpoint, method]
      properties:
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Subject'
        endpoint: {type: string}
        method: {type: string, enum: [GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH]}
        scope:
          type: object
          properties:
            space_id: {type: string}
            resource_id: {type: string}
        context:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: true

    AccessDecision:
      type: object
      required: [decision, reason]
      properties:
        decision: {type: string, enum: [allow, deny]}
        reason: {type: string}
        matched_roles:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
        required_capabilities:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
        user_capabilities:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
        evaluation_path:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              step: {type: string}
              result: {type: string}
              duration_ms: {type: number}

    # Sync
    PeerRegister:
      type: object
      required: [peer_id, url]
      properties:
        peer_id: {type: string}
        url: {type: string, format: uri}

    SyncStatus:
      type: object
      required: [window_seconds, peers]
      properties:
        window_seconds: {type: number, minimum: 0}
        peers:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required: [peer_id, lag_seconds]
            properties:
              peer_id: {type: string}
              lag_seconds: {type: number, minimum: 0}

    # Feature Flags
    FlagsList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required: [key, enabled]
            properties:
              key: {type: string}
              enabled: {type: boolean}

    # Security Context (for policy middleware)
    SecurityContext:
      type: object
      required: [user_id, device_id, authenticated]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        user_id: {type: string, format: uuid}
        device_id: {type: string, pattern: "^[A-Za-z0-9._:-]{3,64}$"}
        authenticated: {type: boolean}
        auth_method: {type: string, enum: [mtls, jwt, api_key]}
        capabilities:
          type: array
          items: {type: string, enum: ["WRITE", "RECALL", "PROJECT", "SCHEDULE"]}
        mls_group: {type: string, pattern: "^[A-Za-z0-9._:-]{3,64}$"}
        trust_level: {type: string, enum: ["green", "amber", "red", "black"]}

    # QoS Headers Contract
    QoSHeaders:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        priority: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 10}
        latency_budget_ms: {type: integer, minimum: 1, maximum: 1000}
        deadline_ms: {type: integer, minimum: 1}
        retries: {type: integer, minimum: 0, maximum: 3}
        routing: {type: string, enum: ["fast-path", "gate-path"]}

    # Middleware Chain Response
    PolicyDecisionResponse:
      type: object
      required: [decision, reasons]
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        decision: {type: string, enum: ["ALLOW", "DENY", "ALLOW_REDACTED"]}
        reasons:
          type: array
          items: {type: string}
        obligations:
          type: array
          items: {type: string, enum: ["REDACT_PII", "AUDIT_ACCESS", "TOMBSTONE_ON_DELETE", "SYNC_REQUIRED"]}
        band: {type: string, enum: ["GREEN", "AMBER", "RED", "BLACK"]}

openapi: 3.0.3
info:

servers:

paths:

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Perception Edge API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: Ingestion for sensor frames; emits SENSORY_FRAME events.
servers:
  - url: https://edge.local
    description: Edge plane (device-local or LAN)
security:
  - mtls: []
  - bearer: []
paths:
  /v1/perception/sensors:
    get:
      summary: List available sensors & capabilities
      operationId: listSensors
      responses:
        '200': { description: OK, content: { application/json: { schema: { type: object, properties: { sensors: { type: array, items: { type: object, properties: { id: {type: string}, kind: {type: string, enum: ["mic","camera","accel","gyro","gps","other"]}, status: {type: string}, device_trust: {type: string, enum: ["low","medium","high"]} }, required: ["id","kind"] } } } } } } }
        '4XX': { $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest' }
        '5XX': { $ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError' }
  /v1/perception/sensors/{sensor_id}/frames:
    post:
      summary: Ingest a sensor frame (edge)
      operationId: ingestFrame
      parameters:
        - name: sensor_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema: { type: string }
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XTraceId'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/XQoSLatencyBudget'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/SensoryFrameIngest' }
      responses:
        '202': { description: Accepted (event enqueued), content: { application/json: { schema: { type: object, properties: { envelope_id: {type: string}, dedupe_key: {type: string} }, required: ["envelope_id"] } } } }
        '4XX': { $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest' }
        '5XX': { $ref: '#/components/responses/ServerError' }
components:
  securitySchemes:
    mtls: { type: mutualTLS }
    bearer: { type: http, scheme: bearer }
  parameters:
    XTraceId:
      name: X-Trace-Id
      in: header
      required: false
      schema: { type: string }
    XQoSLatencyBudget:
      name: X-QoS-Latency-Budget
      in: header
      required: false
      schema: { type: integer, minimum: 1 }
  responses:
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad request
      content: { application/json: { schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' } } }
    ServerError:
      description: Server error
      content: { application/json: { schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' } } }
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        code: { type: string }
        message: { type: string }
        details: { type: object }
      required: [code, message]
    SensoryFrameIngest:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        kind: { type: string, enum: ["mic","camera","accel","gyro","gps","other"] }
        ts: { type: string, format: date-time }
        meta: { type: object, additionalProperties: true }
        data_ref: { type: string, description: "Opaque handle; no raw blobs over HTTP in production." }
        qos: { type: object, properties: { priority: { type: string, enum: ["low","normal","high"] } } }
      required: [kind, ts]

---
# Policy Module API Specification
# Internal endpoints for policy evaluation and content redaction

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: "Policy Module Internal API"
  description: "PDP/PEP with ABAC+RBAC, policy evaluation and redaction services"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: "MemoryOS Contract Council"
    
servers:
  - url: "/__internal/policy"
    description: "Internal policy evaluation service"

paths:
  /eval:
    post:
      summary: "Evaluate access request against policies"
      description: "Policy Decision Point (PDP) - evaluates ABAC+RBAC rules"
      operationId: "evaluatePolicy"
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PolicyEvaluationRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Policy evaluation result"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PolicyEvaluationResponse'
        '400':
          description: "Invalid request format"
        '401':
          description: "Authentication required"
        '403':
          description: "Insufficient permissions"
        '429':
          description: "Rate limit exceeded"
        '500':
          description: "Internal policy evaluation error"

  /redact:
    post:
      summary: "Apply content redaction based on policies"
      description: "Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) - applies band-based redaction"
      operationId: "redactContent"
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RedactionRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Redacted content"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RedactionResponse'
        '400':
          description: "Invalid content format"
        '401':
          description: "Authentication required"
        '403':
          description: "Insufficient permissions"
        '500':
          description: "Redaction processing error"

  /policies:
    get:
      summary: "List active policies"
      description: "Retrieve current policy documents (admin only)"
      operationId: "listPolicies"
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: "version"
          in: "query"
          description: "Policy version filter"
          schema:
            type: "string"
        - name: "effective_date"
          in: "query"
          description: "Filter by effective date"
          schema:
            type: "string"
            format: "date-time"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Policy list"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PolicyListResponse'
        '401':
          description: "Authentication required"
        '403':
          description: "Admin access required"

    post:
      summary: "Create or update policy"
      description: "Add new policy document (admin only)"
      operationId: "createPolicy"
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PolicyDocument'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: "Policy created"
        '400':
          description: "Invalid policy document"
        '401':
          description: "Authentication required"
        '403':
          description: "Admin access required"
        '409':
          description: "Policy version conflict"

  /health:
    get:
      summary: "Health check"
      description: "Policy service health status"
      operationId: "healthCheck"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Service healthy"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthStatus'

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT

  schemas:
    PolicyEvaluationRequest:
      type: object
      required: ["subject", "resource", "action", "context"]
      properties:
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Subject'
        resource:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Resource'
        action:
          type: string
          enum: ["read", "write", "delete", "execute", "admin"]
        context:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
        
    PolicyEvaluationResponse:
      type: object
      required: ["decision", "reason", "audit_id"]
      properties:
        decision:
          type: string
          enum: ["permit", "deny", "indeterminate"]
        reason:
          type: string
          description: "Human-readable decision explanation"
        applicable_policies:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          description: "Policy IDs that were evaluated"
        audit_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: "Audit trail identifier"
        cached:
          type: boolean
          description: "True if result was from cache"
        ttl_seconds:
          type: integer
          description: "Cache TTL for this decision"

    RedactionRequest:
      type: object
      required: ["content", "band", "context"]
      properties:
        content:
          type: string
          description: "Content to redact"
        content_type:
          type: string
          enum: ["text", "json", "xml", "markdown"]
          default: "text"
        band:
          type: string
          enum: ["GREEN", "AMBER", "RED", "BLACK"]
        context:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
        redaction_level:
          type: string
          enum: ["none", "minimal", "aggressive", "total"]
          description: "Override default band redaction level"

    RedactionResponse:
      type: object
      required: ["redacted_content", "redaction_applied", "audit_id"]
      properties:
        redacted_content:
          type: string
          description: "Content after redaction"
        redaction_applied:
          type: boolean
          description: "True if any redaction was performed"
        redaction_count:
          type: integer
          description: "Number of redactions applied"
        audit_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid

    Subject:
      type: object
      required: ["user_id", "space_id"]
      properties:
        user_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        space_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        roles:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        attributes:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: true

    Resource:
      type: object
      required: ["type", "id"]
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          enum: ["memory", "space", "policy", "system"]
        id:
          type: string
        space_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        attributes:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: true

    Context:
      type: object
      properties:
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        ip_address:
          type: string
        user_agent:
          type: string
        session_id:
          type: string
        request_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        band:
          type: string
          enum: ["GREEN", "AMBER", "RED", "BLACK"]
        attributes:
          type: object
          additionalProperties: true

    PolicyDocument:
      $ref: '../storage/policy_document.schema.json'

    PolicyListResponse:
      type: object
      required: ["policies", "total"]
      properties:
        policies:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PolicyDocument'
        total:
          type: integer
        page:
          type: integer
        per_page:
          type: integer

    HealthStatus:
      type: object
      required: ["status", "timestamp"]
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          enum: ["healthy", "degraded", "unhealthy"]
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        policy_count:
          type: integer
        cache_hit_rate:
          type: number
        avg_evaluation_time_ms:
          type: number

openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: Prospective API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: Trigger CRUD for Prospective (P05)
servers:
  - url: "/v1"
security:
  - bearer: []
paths:
  /prospective/triggers:
    post:
      summary: Upsert trigger
      tags: [Prospective]
      parameters:
        - in: header
          name: Idempotency-Key
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 8
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Trigger"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Upserted
          headers:
            X-Receipt-Id:
              schema:
                type: string
        "409":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Conflict"
    get:
      summary: List triggers
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: space_id
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "../events/schemas/_common.json#/definitions/SpaceRef"
        - in: query
          name: page
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            default: 1
        - in: query
          name: page_size
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 200
            default: 50
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/TriggerList"
  /prospective/triggers/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get trigger
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Trigger found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Trigger"
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
    delete:
      summary: Delete trigger
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Deleted
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
  /prospective/triggers/{id}/preview:
    post:
      summary: Check eligibility window now
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Preview"
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
  responses:
    NotFound:
      description: Not found
    Conflict:
      description: Duplicate Idempotency-Key within window
  schemas:
    Trigger:
      type: object
      required: [id, space_id, title, schedule, action, conditions]
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          pattern: "^[A-Za-z0-9_-]{6,64}$"
        space_id:
          $ref: "../events/schemas/_common.json#/definitions/SpaceRef"
        title:
          type: string
          maxLength: 120
        schedule:
          oneOf:
            - type: object
              required: [type, time_of_day, days_of_week]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "daily_time"
                time_of_day:
                  type: string
                  pattern: "^[0-2][0-9]:[0-5][0-9]$"
                days_of_week:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: integer
                    minimum: 0
                    maximum: 6
            - type: object
              required: [type, at]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "at"
                at:
                  $ref: "../events/schemas/_common.json#/definitions/ISOInstant"
            - type: object
              required: [type, cron]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "cron"
                cron:
                  type: string
        action:
          oneOf:
            - type: object
              required: [type,title]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "notify"
                title:
                  type: string
                body:
                  type: string
            - type: object
              required: [type,procedure_id]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "run_procedure"
                procedure_id:
                  type: string
            - type: object
              required: [type,topic]
              properties:
                type:
                  const: "emit_event"
                topic:
                  type: string
                payload:
                  type: object
        conditions:
          type: object
          properties:
            require_arousal_max:
              type: number
              minimum: 0
              maximum: 1
            disallow_safety_pressure_min:
              type: number
              minimum: 0
              maximum: 1
            cooldown_seconds:
              type: integer
              minimum: 0
              default: 0
    TriggerList:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Trigger"
        next_page:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
    Preview:
      type: object
      properties:
        eligible:
          type: boolean
        reason:
          type: string
        next_window_start:
          $ref: "../events/schemas/_common.json#/definitions/ISOInstant"

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: FamilyOS Retrieval (module subset)
  version: "1.0.0"
  x-reuses: "See contracts/api/openapi.v1.yaml for canonical components and error models."
paths:
  /v1/tools/memory/recall:
    post:
      operationId: recallMemory
      summary: Recall items via retrieval broker (P01)
      tags: [Plane:Agents, Pipeline:P01 Recall]
      security: [ { mtls: [] }, { bearer: [] } ]
      parameters:
        - $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/parameters/XTraceId"
        - $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/parameters/XQoSLatencyBudget"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema: { $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/schemas/RecallRequest" }

        '200': { description: OK, content: { application/json: { schema: { $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/schemas/RecallResponse" } } } }
        '4XX': { $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/responses/BadRequest" }
        '5XX': { $ref: "../_reuses.yaml#/components/responses/ServerError" }
      x-slo: { p95_ms: 120 }

openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: Sync API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: CRDT-based P2P replication
servers:
  - url: "/v1"
security:
  - bearer: []
paths:
  /sync/pull:
    post:
      summary: Pull ops since vector clock
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SyncRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operations since vector clock
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SyncResponse"
  /sync/push:
    post:
      summary: Push local ops
      parameters:
        - in: header
          name: Idempotency-Key
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PushBatch"
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "409":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Conflict"
  /sync/peers:
    get:
      summary: List peers
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Peer list
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Peer"
  /sync/peers/{peer_id}/rotate-keys:
    post:
      summary: Rotate MLS keys with peer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
  responses:
    Conflict:
      description: Duplicate batch id
  schemas:
    CRDTOperation:
      $ref: "../../contracts/storage/crdt.schema.json#/definitions/CRDTOperation"
    SyncRequest:
      $ref: "../../contracts/storage/crdt.schema.json#/definitions/SyncRequest"
    SyncResponse:
      $ref: "../../contracts/storage/crdt.schema.json#/definitions/SyncResponse"
    PushBatch:
      type: object
      required: [batch_id, operations, vector_clock, space_id]
      properties:
        batch_id:
          type: string
        operations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CRDTOperation"
        vector_clock:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: integer
            minimum: 0
        space_id:
          $ref: "../events/schemas/_common.json#/definitions/SpaceRef"
    Peer:
      type: object
      required: [id, device_id, status]
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        device_id:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          enum: ["connected","disconnected","unknown"]

name: contracts-validate

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, develop ]
    paths: [ 'contracts/**' ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, develop ]
    paths: [ 'contracts/**' ]

jobs:
  validate-schemas:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Validate Contract Schemas

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'

      - name: Install Python dependencies
        run: |
          pip install jsonschema pyyaml openapi-spec-validator

      - name: Install Node.js dependencies
        run: |
          npm install -g @redocly/cli @stoplight/spectral-cli

      - name: Validate JSON Schemas
        working-directory: contracts
        run: |
          python tooling/validate_all.py

      - name: Bundle OpenAPI Specs
        working-directory: contracts
        run: |
          for spec in modules/*/api/openapi.yaml; do
            if [ -f "$spec" ]; then
              echo "Bundling $spec"
              npx @redocly/cli bundle "$spec" -o /dev/null
            fi
          done

      - name: Lint OpenAPI Specs
        working-directory: contracts
        run: |
          for spec in modules/*/api/openapi.yaml; do
            if [ -f "$spec" ]; then
              echo "Linting $spec"
              npx spectral lint "$spec" -r tooling/spectral.config.yaml
            fi
          done

  check-versions:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Check Version Consistency

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install pyyaml

      - name: Check version formats
        working-directory: contracts
        run: |
          python3 -c "
          import yaml
          import re
          import sys
          from pathlib import Path

          errors = []
          semver_pattern = r'^(0|[1-9]\d*)\.(0|[1-9]\d*)\.(0|[1-9]\d*)(?:-((?:0|[1-9]\d*|\d*[a-zA-Z-][0-9a-zA-Z-]*)))*(?:\+([0-9a-zA-Z-]+(?:\.[0-9a-zA-Z-]+)*))?$'

          for versions_file in Path('modules').glob('*/versions.yaml'):
              if versions_file.exists():
                  with open(versions_file) as f:
                      data = yaml.safe_load(f)
                      if 'current' in data:
                          version = data['current']
                          if not re.match(semver_pattern, version):
                              errors.append(f'{versions_file}: Invalid SemVer format: {version}')
                      else:
                          errors.append(f'{versions_file}: Missing current version')

          if errors:
              for error in errors:
                  print(f'❌ {error}')
              sys.exit(1)
          else:
              print('✅ All versions are valid SemVer format')
          "

  contract-impact-analysis:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Contract Impact Analysis
    if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0  # Need full history for diff

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install pyyaml

      - name: Analyze contract changes
        working-directory: contracts
        run: |
          python3 -c "
          import subprocess
          import json
          import yaml

          # Get list of changed contract files
          result = subprocess.run(['git', 'diff', '--name-only', 'origin/main', 'HEAD'],
                                capture_output=True, text=True)
          changed_files = [f for f in result.stdout.strip().split('\n') if f.startswith('contracts/')]

          if not changed_files:
              print('No contract changes detected')
              exit(0)

          print('📋 Contract Impact Analysis')
          print('=' * 30)

          breaking_changes = []
          version_bumps = []

          for file in changed_files:
              print(f'📄 Changed: {file}')

              if 'versions.yaml' in file:
                  # Check if this is a major version bump
                  try:
                      result = subprocess.run(['git', 'show', f'origin/main:{file}'],
                                            capture_output=True, text=True)
                      if result.returncode == 0:
                          old_data = yaml.safe_load(result.stdout)
                          with open(file) as f:
                              new_data = yaml.safe_load(f)

                          old_version = old_data.get('current', '0.0.0')
                          new_version = new_data.get('current', '0.0.0')

                          if old_version != new_version:
                              version_bumps.append(f'{file}: {old_version} → {new_version}')

                              # Check for major version bump (breaking change)
                              old_major = int(old_version.split('.')[0])
                              new_major = int(new_version.split('.')[0])
                              if new_major > old_major:
                                  breaking_changes.append(f'{file}: Major version bump detected')
                  except Exception as e:
                      print(f'⚠️  Could not analyze {file}: {e}')

          if version_bumps:
              print('\n📈 Version Changes:')
              for bump in version_bumps:
                  print(f'  {bump}')

          if breaking_changes:
              print('\n⚠️  Breaking Changes Detected:')
              for change in breaking_changes:
                  print(f'  {change}')
              print('\n🚨 Please ensure:')
              print('  1. Migration documentation is updated')
              print('  2. Deprecation notices are in place')
              print('  3. Backward compatibility is considered')
          else:
              print('\n✅ No breaking changes detected')
          "

  security-scan:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Security Scan

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Scan for secrets
        uses: trufflesecurity/trufflehog@main
        with:
          path: contracts/

      - name: Check for sensitive patterns
        run: |
          # Check for potential sensitive information in contracts
          if grep -r -i "password\|secret\|key\|token" contracts/ --exclude-dir=.git; then
            echo "⚠️  Potential sensitive information found in contracts"
            echo "Please review and remove any secrets"
            exit 1
          else
            echo "✅ No sensitive patterns detected"
          fi

version: "1.0.0"
strategy: semver
topics:
